name: Elements of Power
description:
ELEMENTS OF POWER

Elements of Power is a third person, single player tower defense game, where you select one element to control, and you fight off enemies trying to destroy the city and your home. This game was made in 2 weeks. Enjoy!

A FEW BASIC CONTROLS: WASD - Basic Movement (like every game ever) Right Mouse Button: Aim - You must use this before EVERY attack! (this is how the wizard charges up his attacks) Left Mouse Button:  Fire Atack Escape / Tab: Pause Game A FINAL MESSAGE We over at beneath studios have worked very hard on this project to try and make it fit up to game jam standards. We have had our issues, and conquered them, and managed to put together a playable demo for a possible new game. We hope you enjoy.  TIPS 1. The AI does not wait for you , they begin attacking the tower immediately, so choose your element quickly! 2. The fire element is the most powerful 3. The enemy cannot attack you, so dont be shy to attack first.
